heading: Prayer in the public schools.
general-note: Here are entered works on the inclusion of prayers or a period of silent prayer or meditation in the daily schedule of public schools. Works containing collections of prayers for use in schools are entered under. Schools--Prayers.. Works on the teaching of religion and/or the presentation of religious programs in the public schools as well as on the exercise of freedom of religion by students and school employees are entered under. Religion in the public schools..
